name: Crime Opera: The Caterpillar Candids (Fandisk)
description:
WARNING: This game contains spoilers for Crime Opera: The Butterfly Effect! You will want to download and play that before launching this app!

The Caterpillar Candids is the second fandisk to Crime Opera: The Butterfly Effect! This time around, you can read through various short stories that take place before, during, and after the events of the original visual novel. The stories included are:

1. A Day in the Strife - A day in the life of Terry Childers, a side character from the Butterfly Effect.

2. Recollections - Molly and Alice get together to reminisce about the past, revisiting critical moments from their lives.

3. Aftermath - An epilogue exploring the immediate aftermath of The Butterfly Effect.

As with the original game, all profits go into creating further entries in the series. Keep an eye out for Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect, coming this Summer (2022)!
